specs.title: unauthenticated user should not access admin dashboard
unauthenticated user should not access products page
unauthenticated user should not access categories page
session should persist across page navigations
should show error on invalid email/password
should login successfully with correct credentials
should deny access with empty credentials
should handle case sensitivity in email
should prevent brute force with invalid attempts
should handle SQL injection attempt in email field

specs.title: API error responses should have proper format
API response headers should be secure
should handle API error on invalid create
should handle duplicate category creation gracefully
customer should submit contact form on homepage
customer should not access admin panel directly
customer should see 404 on invalid page
customer should handle network error gracefully
customer should see responsive design on mobile
